content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I attempted to activate the arcgis environment using various shell commands but encountered errors indicating that the necessary files could not be found. All AI suggested commands failed with the same error message. I tried multiple variations of shell commands to activate the environment, but all attempts returned errors indicating that conda could not be found. My latest action was to execute a shell command to activate the arcgis environment, but it returned an error indicating that the necessary file could not be found.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "execute_shell", "args": {"command_line": "source /home/atlas/miniconda3/bin/activate && conda activate arcgis && echo \'Environment activated.\'"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command execute_shell returned: STDOUT:\nb''\nSTDERR:\nb'/bin/sh: 1: source: not found\\n'", type='action_result')]
"""
